description:
Description:

TerraCycle Overview

Our mission is to “Eliminate the Idea of Waste". Operating in 22 countries, TerraCycle is a global innovator in the circular economy, specialising in recycling hard-to-recycle materials. Our programs collect and recycle almost any waste stream, including beauty packaging, disposable face masks, babies' nappies, cigarette butts and chewing gum, which we then turn into new products - like the world's first shampoo bottle made from beach plastic, for example.

As a social enterprise, we drive positive change by partnering with some of the world’s largest corporations such as L'Oréal, P&G and Colgate to transform the collected packaging into new products like outdoor furniture, playgrounds and park benches

Job Overview

We are looking for an outgoing, polished, highly organized, team-focused Account Manager to work with our corporate brand partners (clients) on marketing and program initiatives for TerraCycle’s national recycling programs. Primary responsibilities include supporting a portfolio of TerraCycle’s partners and facilitating internal processes to drive program growth. The position reports directly to the Account Director, Brand Partnerships.

Responsibilities will include client relations as well as general program support, and the successful applicant will be comfortable working in both capacities.

Primary Responsibilities:
• Support the development of strategic marketing, communications, and sustainability recommendations for a portfolio of clients
• Draft client-ready materials including program reports, renewal presentations, and proposals
• Support the launch of new recycling programs, account planning and renewal for a portfolio of accounts
• Coordinate with internal teams including Marketing, Design, Business Development, and Operations to ensure the timely execution of marketing, social media, website, PR, and operational deliverables
• Manage and monitor program collections and invoicing
• Maintain and update internal and external reports and trackers
• Additional projects and responsibilities as needed to support the business

Requirements:

Desired Qualifications:
• Qualifications in business, marketing, communications, sustainability, or related field
• 3+ years of professional experience
• Exceptional verbal and written communication skills
• Outstanding organizational and time management skills
• Previous client management, brand marketing or agency experience a strong plus
• Strong strategic and creative problem-solving skills
• Agile mindset, flexible and easily adaptable to new challenges
• Ability to juggle multiple responsibilities in a dynamic, rapidly evolving work environment
• Comfortable working as a member of a team as well as pursuing projects independently
• Thrives in high-pressure situations while working through complex projects

Compensation
• Entrepreneurial start up environment with global growth opportunities
• Annual bonus gift
• Flexible work hours
• Flex Fridays, compressed working week with half-day off on Fridays
• 2 paid volunteer days off per year
• 2 working from home days per week
• Generous parental leave package
• Vegan lunch provided at the office
• Happiness manager-led regular social activities
• Dog friendly office
• Casual dress code
• Mental health sick days
• 1 week work from anywhere policy
• Endless recycling options!

TerraCycle requires all employees to provide proof that they have been fully vaccinated against the COVID-19 virus, or have a valid religious or medical reason for being exempt.

TerraCycle is an Equal Opportunity Employer and is committed to Diversity, Equality and Inclusion.

Note: International candidates must be eligible to work in their country of employment. At this time TerraCycle does not provide for visa sponsorships.

Job description is not all inclusive. TerraCycle reserves the right to amend this job description at any time.
